response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its rarity and significance, I believe it deserves a home where it can be appreciated fully. Considering its intrinsic qualities and the effort put into its creation, I kindly propose a price of $750,000 for this masterpiece. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for exceptional items. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
